DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare relative bioavailability Lansoprazole DR Capsules 30 mg Prevacid® Capsules 30 mg fast condition healthy adult human subject .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Lansoprazole DR Capsules 30 mg Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: open label , randomize , two-treatment , three-period , three-sequence , partial replicate oral bioequivalence study Lansoprazole 30 mg DR Capsules Dr.Reddy 's Laboratories Limited , India compare PREVACID® ( contain Lansoprazole ) 30 mg DR Capsules TAP Pharmaceuticals Inc. USA , healthy , adult , human subject fast condition . 48 healthy , adult , human subject enrol study 42 subject complete study .
